long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the crypto price feed extension, which enables the user to see to live prices of the top 10 cryptocurrencies in the current scenario. This enables the Traders and the investors to have a hands-on plugin to monitor the prices.  

For developers-
- This extension is made up of manifest version 3
- If you want to learn developing a chrome extension visit
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0n809nd4Zu4
- GitHub Repo -  https://github.com/Shubham1632/FeedPrice
( Go and fork the repo, and also leave a star if you like )


Tech Stack-
- Manifest Version 3
- JavaScript
- HTML
- CSS

Issues for Contributions-
- color pallet when the price drop goes below 0% doesn't have a good UX
- Adding a Dark and light mode
- Functionality to change the currency of prices 
( for contributions the GitHub repo is mentioned above )

Please do share with your friends if you find it helpful. and if any kind of issue is there, please let me know.  Suggestions are always welcomed.
